text: There he is! Jill Duggar shared a new photo of her newborn son, Samuel, on Instagram on Tuesday, July 25. “ Meet # SamuelScottDillard This little handsome fella is getting bigger every day! We are so in love with him!, ” the TLC star captioned a shot of Samuel looking comfy in teeny sweatpants and a blue onesie. Duggar and her husband, Derick Dillard, shared a first glimpse at Samuel on July 13 just one week after he was born, with a hospital pic.
